name: Hilton Taba Resort & Nelson Village

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had an amazing time at this hotel last week. The staff are very friendly: Yasser and his crew at Nelson Pub and the boys at Pirates bar to name a few... The hotel facilities were adequate though I think its a bit cheeky to charge for snooker and table tennis and non motorised sports when you have paid for an all inclusive holiday!!The food was not bad but think there should be a better selection for vegetarians at the main buffet restaurant.
reviews.title: amazing staff,snorkelling and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The snorkelling was amazing just on the hotel front and a few people mentioned it was better then the specialised boat trips.
reviews.title: Fantastic service is what makes this hotel 5*

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the whole I would recommend this hotel to anyone,
reviews.title: The Ultimate Relaxation!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed in the Taba Hilton Sept 2009 for two weeks on an AI basis; value wise it was fantastic as it cost just over the £850 mark. We have stayed in this hotel previously around 7 years ago before it was AI and when there were much larger numbers of Israelis using it as a short break hotel.
reviews.title: russia with sun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Firstly the good points:
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel and staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for a fortnight and had a beautiful see view room, clean, comfortable, and well serviced. The hotel is in a paradise location and we would say to anyone - go there. Not a hint of tummy trouble, lovely pool, right on the beach, sea is like swimming through an aquarium.
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday at this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: However, the shining light for the hotel is it's staff - quite the most friendly and helpful people I've met anywhere (that's no exageration). Nothing is too much trouble for them, after seeing you twice running they know what you want and get it without asking - fabulous people.
reviews.title: Memorable week away..we would return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009
reviews.text: Unfair to single anyone out, but must mention Sameh in the Palm Court restaurant, Ali at the pool (always a sunbed when we wanted it), and Sam of the activity team.
reviews.title: I loved it but my daughter didn't

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Restaurants.
reviews.title: Lovely place, lives up to the expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Marahba - staff fantastic with a brilliant sense of humour, food first class (included in the package).
reviews.title: What a wonderful week!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we work for ourselves and were in desperate need of a relaxing,value for money week away. i had always been put of egypt mainly because of the flight (5 hours) but we flew with monach and with a meal and film included the time flew by !
reviews.title: A brilliant, relaxing, value for money holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i saw this deal on travel zoo and i have to say i was not disappointed. if you want a relaxing, quitet break with nothing to do except, lay in the sun and have someone to cook your meals and clean your room then this is the place for you. the staff at the hilton taba are fantastic from the management to the cleaners. courteous, polite and non can do too much to please. you even get fresh petals, flowers or something on your bed every day, all the cleaning is done by men and they love to make the room look nice. the food was really good and had a choice of 4 restaurants. snorkling was fab and you can do this while standing so if you dont swim well then is a must for you. just stand in the water off their private beach and see it all. this hotel is fantastic and i have no problem recommending it to anyone who want mothing more than relax. its not for anyone wanting nightlife. everyone gets up early and just lays by the pool or the beach. its also worth a mention that the beach is so close to the hotel and that the disabled facilities looked great to i always take notice of these as my mum uses a buggy and i would have no hesitation taking her there.
reviews.title: PARADISE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: if you go give my love to arm, one of the sweetest waiters in the world,any problems ask for mohamed mostun the guest relations manager and in the main restaurant be prepared to be treated like royalty by ahmed all fantastic staff managed with perfection by anwar the manager. they will treat you like friends they have never met before from the moment they meet you.
reviews.title: Totally relaxation with friendly smiling staff - the Hilton Taba Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i noticed a couple of negative reviews about this hotel before i went, if you treat these people with the respect they deserve they are just brilliant.
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: SUPER HOTEL GOOD FOOD GREAT LOCATION. It would be unfair to single out any of the wonderful staff, but special thanks to Mohamed Shedid in the Palm Court restaurant, Azzam and Tarek in the pool bar, Ayman in the Rainbow bar and Amr the ice cream man and all the guys at the Nelson. One word of advice, GO.
reviews.title: not the best but not bad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just returned from probably the BEST holiday we've EVER had at the Hilton Taba. Where do I begin... We could not fault this wonderful place, the hotel & it's surroundings are beautiful, the staff are AMAZING, the snorkling is breath-taking, the food is wonderful & there is plenty of it.
reviews.title: WOW WOW WOW WOW WOW

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: I would especially like to thank Azzam & Tarek (the best cocktail makers ever) they were wonderful & friendly & are an credit to the Hilton Taba, Mohammed our waiter in the main restaurant and Sam (& the rest of the Animation team) the aqua aerobics is brilliant & loads of fun please don't be shy & give it a try.
reviews.title: wow, wow, wow cant wait to go back!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The weather was fantastic & we always got a sunbed by the pool & there were beds by the beach if you wanted them.
reviews.title: Ever been fooled by mixed reviews then read on!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was fantastic, Palm court (main restaurant) we were spoilt for choice at the buffet. Nelson's bar was great for lunch with wonderful views over Jordan, Israel & Saudi Arabia & the evening menu was great too. Marhaba was lovely, very intimate & great service. Casa Taba was beautiful, the fillet steak with gorgonzola cheese sauce is to die for & the service is outstanding. Pirates bar is lovely too with a great view out over the sea but sadly this closed at 10pm. It has a great atmosphere & the staff brilliant. The entertainment is good & the service in the lounge is great.
reviews.title: Excellent Hol

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There were a couple of people who had birthdays while we were there & the Palm court staff were fantastic, all the waiters were singing & dancing & brought them a cake, it must have made the people's birthdays really memorable & it was lovely to watch. The like i've never seen before it was brilliant.
reviews.title: Wonderfull hotel in wonderful place

aka: Hilton Taba Resort & Nelson Village Hotel Taba
